posts.title: Pixel 8 Pro
posts.description: Google Pixel 8 Pro is a real deal for modern, high-end smartphones in 2023. It comes with Bluetooth 5.3, A2DP, LE, aptX HD, supports NFC, has an under-the-display, optical finger sensor and USB Type-C 3.2. Powering the handset is Li-Ion 5,050 mAh, non-removable battery with 30W wired, PD3

posts.title: iPhone 15
posts.description:
RAM: 6GB
Storage: 128GB,256GB
Battery: 3,200 mAh
Camera: 48MP + 12 MP
Selfie: 12MP + SL 3D
Display: 6.1 inches
Processor: Apple A16 Bionic
Connectivity: 5G, Nano-SIM, eSIM, Wi-Fi 6
Colors:   Black, Blue, Green, Yellow, Pink
OS: iOS 17
